metadata.dc:author: Pont Sanjuan, V
Sánchez Carazo, J L
Obón Losada, L
metadata.dc:description: We revised the most important antifungal drugs used in cutaneous mycosis. We emphasize in pharmacokinetics, drug adverse reactions and its management in the different types of pathology.
metadata.dc:title: Tratamiento actual de las micosis superficiales.
[Current treatment of superficial mycosis.].
